EmailTemplate.description: An email requesting customers to take part in our Persona survey
EmailTemplate.name: Legend Persona
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell us about your ultimate boating experience and get 5% off your next Legend Accessories purchase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Account.FirstName},
I've got an interesting opportunity for you. We're looking for people just like you to take part in our Legend Boats Persona Survey. I say people like you because we want to know what makes anyone who has shown an interest in Legend Boats tick. And that's you!
If you would be so kind as to fill out the Legend Boats Persona Survey survey, it should only take about 5 minutes of your time. By doing so, you'll be helping Legend Boats improve upon the sphere of people we influence, but you'll also be helping yourself by being entered into a draw to win a FREE Humminbird Helix 5 Fishfinder!
Just click here to fill out the survey and hopefully get yourself a brand new fishfinder!
Thank you so much for your time to fill out this survey! Let me know if I can do anything else to be of service.
Yours in Boating,
Lisa Turcott
The Oracle
